title: Minimum Number of Days to Eat N Oranges
content: There are oranges in the kitchen and you decided to eat some of these oranges every day as follows: Eat one orange. If the number of remaining oranges () is divisible by 2 then you can eat n/2 oranges. If the number of remaining oranges () is divisible by 3 then you can eat 2*(n/3) oranges. You can only choose one of the actions per day. Return the minimum number of days to eat oranges.
